Hello, not sure if this should be in support or gameplay questions, please move if it is in the wrong sub.

Is the UI supposed to scale when you reset resolution? Going from default resolution to 2560 x 1440, the UI gets really small, is this supposed to happen or is this an issue? I am on a Mac with Nvidia GeForce GTX 680MX 2048 MB, on a 2560 x 1440 screen.

Thanks.

Edited September 28, 2014 by Claw
bug tag
The interface is probably a specific size and when you increase the resolution it just appears smaller. Viewed at 1920x1080 it seems to have scaled like that, anyway.

Yeah, the unfortunately the UI doesn't scale on the higher resolutions. I have no idea when this might get addressed. Fortunately, I think the only problems it causes is being very small (still functions).

Edit: Also, moved...

Cheers
